Token.Abstract: The TKListViewDelegate protocol defines methods that allow you to manage the selection of items in TKListView, to perform actions on those items, and respond to interaction with those items.
* Returns a boolean value indicating whether the specified item should be highlighted.

Parameter.Name: listView
Parameter.Abstract: The TKListView instance requesting this information.

Parameter.Name: indexPath
Parameter.Abstract: The index path of the item about to be highlighted.

ReturnValue.Abstract: YES if the item should be highlighted.

Token.Abstract: This method is called after highliting an item.

Parameter.Name: listView
Parameter.Abstract: The TKListView instance.

Parameter.Name: indexPath
Parameter.Abstract: The index path of the highlighted item.

Token.Abstract: This method is called after unhighliting an item.

Parameter.Name: listView
Parameter.Abstract: The TKListView instance.

Parameter.Name: indexPath
Parameter.Abstract: The index path of the unhighlighted item.

Token.Abstract: Returns a boolean value indicating whether the specified item should be selected.

Parameter.Name: listView
Parameter.Abstract: The TKListView instance requesting this information.

Parameter.Name: indexPath
Parameter.Abstract: The index path of the item about to be selected.

ReturnValue.Abstract: YES if the item should be selected.

Token.Abstract: Returns a boolean value indicating whether the specified item should be deselected.

Parameter.Name: listView
Parameter.Abstract: The TKListView instance requesting this information.

Parameter.Name: indexPath
Parameter.Abstract: The index path of the item about to be deselected.

ReturnValue.Abstract: YES if the item should be selected.

Token.Abstract: This method is called after selecting an item.

Parameter.Name: listView
Parameter.Abstract: The TKListView instance.

Parameter.Name: indexPath
Parameter.Abstract: The index path of the selected item.

Token.Abstract: This method is called after deselecting an item.

Parameter.Name: listView
Parameter.Abstract: The TKListView instance.

Parameter.Name: indexPath
Parameter.Abstract: The index path of the deselected item.

Token.Abstract: This method is called after reordering an item an item.

Parameter.Name: listView
Parameter.Abstract: The TKListView instance.

Parameter.Name: originalIndexPath
Parameter.Abstract: The index path we move the item from.

Parameter.Name: targetIndexPath
Parameter.Abstract: The index path we move the item to.

Token.Abstract: This method is called when the user starts swiping a cell.

Parameter.Name: listView
Parameter.Abstract: The TKListView instance.

Parameter.Name: cell
Parameter.Abstract: The TKListViewCell instance being swiped.

Parameter.Name: indexPath
Parameter.Abstract: The index path of the cell being swiped.

Token.Abstract: This method is called when the user swipes a cell. This method is called after shouldSwipeCell and before didFinishSwipingCell.

Parameter.Name: listView
Parameter.Abstract: The TKListView instance.

Parameter.Name: cell
Parameter.Abstract: The TKListViewCell instance being swiped.

Parameter.Name: indexPath
Parameter.Abstract: The index path of the cell being swiped.

Parameter.Name: offset
Parameter.Abstract: The swipe offset.

Token.Abstract: This method is called after the user has finished swiping a cell.

Parameter.Name: listView
Parameter.Abstract: The TKListView instance.

Parameter.Name: cell
Parameter.Abstract: The TKListViewCell instance being swiped.

Parameter.Name: indexPath
Parameter.Abstract: The index path of the cell being swiped.

Parameter.Name: offset
Parameter.Abstract: The swipe offset.

Token.Abstract: This method is called when the user pulls the list view to refresh its data.

Parameter.Name: listView
Parameter.Abstract: The TKListView instance.

Parameter.Name: offset
Parameter.Abstract: The pull offset.

Token.Abstract: This method is called after the user long pressed a cell.

Parameter.Name: listView
Parameter.Abstract: The TKListView instance.

Parameter.Name: cell
Parameter.Abstract: The TKListViewCell instance being long pressed.

Parameter.Name: indexPath
Parameter.Abstract: The index path of the cell being long pressed.

Token.Abstract: Returns a boolean value indicating whether more data will be loaded. Called after the user requested loading more data on demand by scrolling over the cellBuffer limit size.

Parameter.Name: listView
Parameter.Abstract: The TKListView instance.

Parameter.Name: indexPath
Parameter.Abstract: The index path where the buffer limit size was reached.

Token.Abstract: Returns a boolean value indicating whether listView should display activity indicator and wait for fresh data. Called after user performs pull-to-refresh gesture.

Parameter.Name: listView
Parameter.Abstract: The listview component instance requesting the fresh data.
